messages.subject: Re: My Intro :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome Mandi~ We also have 2 girls aged 5 (and a half) and 2 (and a quarter)...one of the reasons we decided to not do the school route was when we realized
messages.messageBody:
Welcome Mandi~

We also have 2 girls aged 5 (and a half) and 2 (and a quarter)...one
of the reasons we decided to not do the school route was when we
realized that they would never be in school together until one year of
HS (we have K-2, 3-5, 6-8, 9-12 public schools here)...I love that
they are getting to spend more time together than just the rushed
moments after school, between homework, and before bed.

Good luck in your journey!

Carolyn Winkler
wife to Bret (10 years) and mama to Sabine (5.5) and Vivian (2.25)
in Wyoming
wahoowinklers.blogspot.com

--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Mandi" <mandialexander@...>
wrote:
>
> Hi! I've been a member here for a couple of months, but I have mostly
> been lurking, so I thought now would be a good time to post an intro.
> My name is Mandi and I have 2 little girls, ages 2 and 5. We are just
> beginning our unschooling journey, so I am really excited about finding
> this group to help us along. I look forward to talking with you all!
>

messages.subject: My Intro :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! I ve been a member here for a couple of months, but I have mostly been lurking, so I thought now would be a good time to post an intro. My name is Mandi
messages.messageBody:
Hi! I've been a member here for a couple of months, but I have mostly
been lurking, so I thought now would be a good time to post an intro.
My name is Mandi and I have 2 little girls, ages 2 and 5. We are just
beginning our unschooling journey, so I am really excited about finding
this group to help us along. I look forward to talking with you all!
